downloadTitle: Update for Microsoft Point of Service for .NET v1.14 (KB2959943)
downloadDescription: Resolves an issue that might occur with the POS for .Net v1.14
detailsSection:
KB2959943 fixes the following issue:
Where POS for .NET v.1.14 applications are unable to claim multiple devices.

If more than one device is claimed in a single or multiple applications there is an exception thrown:  POSControlException ErrorCode(Timeout) ExtendedErrorCode(0) occurred: Another application has exclusive access to the device and did not relinquish control before timeout milliseconds expired.
systemRequirementsSection: This update can be installed on any legal and valid installation of Microsoft Point of Service for .NET v1.14.
installInstructionSection: The self extracting executable creates a directory kb2959943. Review the readme.txt file for installation details.

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Point of Service for .NET v1.14 (POS for .NET)
